name: Gingered Carrot Soup
description: When the cooler weather hits, warm up from the inside out with some soup, the ultimate comfort food. Ginger is like a winter superhero for your taste buds and your immune system. Its zesty warmth adds a delightful kick to any dish, while its natural anti-inflammatory properties help keep those winter sniffles at bay.
preparation: In a Multipurpose Pot, cook onions in oil until soft.
Add carrots, broth, crystallized ginger, and spice.
Simmer for 25—30 minutes, or until carrots are tender. Blend until smooth in blender or food processor.
Return mixture to saucepan. Add juice and cream and heat to steaming. Season to taste with Salt and Pepper.
Serve immediately. Garnish each serving with chives.

And we’re here for it – especially with our Pumpkin Pie Seasoning. We can’t get enough of this stuff because it’s so versatile, is made of only good stuff – and it’s so dang delicious! Want a latte?
